content:
Trying to work on my code and I've hit a couple of different '(kernel) invalid type' and '(kernel) invalid constructor' (IIRC).
I continued to work but now looking through the lean4 channel, it seems each time people bring this up, they are asked to report a bug. Is that correct?
If you can, yes, I think so
If you're unsure, please report a #mwe to #lean4 and we can decide whether it's an issue, and whether it's already a known one.

Ok, will do. I was checking in order not to report expected error messages which I wasn't understanding.
Thank you.
Tom has marked this topic as resolved.
